labels.unlimited_access_bundles: Unlimited access to the Neurovice bundles

messages.hero_title: Step into the next level of adult VR
messages.hero_description: Every week we drop a brand-new memory card—high-quality, interactive, and designed to put you in control. No recycled clips, no passive watching—just full immersion, photoreal models, and scenarios built to feel real from every angle.
messages.purchase_individual_chapter: If you're solely interested in this specific chapter, you have the option to purchase it outright without needing a subscription.
messages.curated_chapter_pack: Curated selection focused on this chapter pack. Enjoy a one-time purchase at a special discounted price.
messages.exclusive_neon_content: Exclusive episodes with neon-pink vibes and highly replayable scenes for power users.
messages.latest_hot_releases: Hot releases and red-alert content for players who want the latest drop first.
messages.newsletter_join: Join our newsletter and follow us on social media for the latest news on our games and special offers!
messages.subscription_hero_title: Look at top stars in your room from any angle
messages.subscription_description: Step into the next level of adult VR with Neurovice. Every week we drop a brand-new memory card—high-quality, interactive, and designed to put you in control. No recycled clips, no passive watching—just full immersion, photoreal models, and scenarios built to feel real from every angle.
messages.vr_headsets_support: Our standalone application is designed to operate seamlessly on the Meta Quest 3 and 3S, as well as the Pico 4 Ultra headset. For users with other headsets, such as those from Valve, HTC, or Pico, you can still enjoy our app by utilizing the PCVR mode, which allows for a smooth and immersive experience across various platforms.
messages.pc_system_requirements: You'll need a Windows PC with at least 8GB of RAM, a mid-range GPU (GTX 1060 or higher), and a stable internet connection.
messages.content_access_description: You'll gain access to immersive VR chapters, character interactions, and premium visual experiences updated frequently.
messages.models_technology: All models are high-quality 3D characters built with advanced motion capture and physics systems.
messages.vr_game_definition: It's an interactive experience built for VR headsets that combines gameplay with immersive adult content.
messages.vr_game_vs_video: Unlike passive videos, VR games offer interactivity, freedom of movement, character choices and real-time animations.
messages.install_header_description: Download our immersive VR application tailored for your device. Experience premium content with stunning visuals and seamless performance.
messages.install_windows_description: Experience the highest fidelity VR with full PCVR support. Includes our standalone 2D viewer for non-VR playback on your desktop.
messages.install_android_description: Download our Android APK for compatible VR headsets. High-quality immersive content optimized for mobile VR devices.
messages.install_meta_description: Get our app directly from the Meta Quest Store. One-click installation for Quest 3, Quest 3S, and Quest Pro users.
messages.email_notifications_copy: Become a true Neurovice and get the latest news, special offers, and exclusive content. We'll send you discounts, secret unlock codes, early access notices - and no spam.
messages.no_active_subscription: YOU DON'T HAVE AN ACTIVE SUBSCRIPTION
messages.auto_switching_copy: Choose whether scenes switch automatically or manually.
messages.hand_rendering_copy: Decide if hands appear transparent in VR or fully rendered.
messages.quick_menu_copy: Enable or disable the one-hand quick menu for faster access.
messages.transaction_disclaimer: Transactions will appear as 'Neurovice Ltd' on your card statement. We only use PCI DSS compliant payment providers to process purchases. We never store your credit card information.

notices.network_error: Network error. Please check your connection.
notices.server_error: Server error. Please try again later.
notices.content_loading_error: Error loading content. Please try again later.

seo.home_title: Neurovice - Premium VR Adult Entertainment | Immersive Virtual Reality Experiences
seo.home_description: Step into the next level of adult VR with Neurovice. Weekly releases of high-quality, interactive VR experiences with photoreal models and full immersion.
seo.blog_title: Blog - Neurovice | VR Adult Entertainment Insights & Tips
seo.blog_description: Stay informed with our latest articles, insights, and expert tips on VR adult entertainment industry trends. Explore immersive experiences and virtual reality innovations.
seo.subscription_title: Subscription Plans - Neurovice | Premium VR Access
seo.subscription_description: Choose your perfect VR subscription plan. Get unlimited access to Neurovice bundles, collectors seasons, and exclusive content. Monthly, yearly, and lifetime options available.
seo.privacy_title: Privacy Policy - Neurovice | Data Protection & Security
seo.privacy_description: Read our privacy policy to understand how Neurovice collects, uses, and protects your personal information. We comply with UK GDPR, EU GDPR, and CCPA regulations.
seo.terms_title: Terms of Use - Neurovice | Legal Agreement & User Guidelines
seo.terms_description: Read our terms of use to understand your rights and responsibilities when using Neurovice. Learn about acceptable use, content policies, and legal agreements.
seo.cookies_title: Cookie Policy - Neurovice | How We Use Cookies
seo.cookies_description: Learn about how Neurovice uses cookies and tracking technologies to improve your experience. Manage your cookie preferences and understand data collection practices.
seo.dmca_title: DMCA Policy - Neurovice | Copyright & Content Removal
seo.dmca_description: Our DMCA policy and copyright infringement procedures. Learn how to report unauthorized content and protect intellectual property rights on Neurovice.
seo.billing_support_title: Billing Support - Neurovice | Payment Help & FAQs
seo.billing_support_description: Get help with billing, payments, subscriptions, and refunds. Contact our support team for assistance with your Neurovice account and transactions.
